commit.message: export nodes belonging to inner lambdas

nodes.bodyText: consider adding test of nested lambda type exporting

commit.message: also add test of type exporting for inner lambdas

nodes.bodyText: should verify that outer is equal to types
should also try to export the internal types of the inner lambda
we need to also bind our own type, unfortunately, removing return false is the simplest way, which is a bit confusing.

commit.message: fix lambda traversing and extend test

nodes.bodyText: I would prefer something like count_types, since this is not really related to exporting
